_xResult.title: Distressed Fairy Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made fun linen skirt with cascading layers
_xResult.longdesc:
Distressed fairies or distressed skirt? You decide. This new design from Aiste of Lithuania in distressed linen is unique and contemporary in design.  It's a little bit Bohemian, a little bit Game of Thrones, and a whole lot of attitude.  Wear it any which way, and let it hang low on your hips or ask for it to be cut higher if you prefer a higher waisted look.

 

Aiste says, "This handmade skirt from linen fabric is made to measure special for You and Your dimensions. Other colors are possible as well. This long skirt can be shorter or to any length. Plus size clothing is available. This linen skirt made from my own unique textured linen. Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly-wherever you go may simply pack them to your travel bag-no additional ironing is needed before you wear this skirt . Choose the first color your eyes stop on and that's the one for you! With love, Aiste"

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and wash cold, dry flat. Dry clean ok.
Pre-washed linen (lurex threads on metallic if selected)
